description:
**Proxmox**

This dashboard provides an overview of your [Proxmox](https://www.proxmox.com/en/) deployment.

**Useful Links**

* [Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/proxmox)
* [Proxmox Developer Docs](https://pve.proxmox.com/pve-docs/)
* [Proxmox API Reference](https://pve.proxmox.com/pve-docs/api-viewer/)
title: Proxmox Overview

definition.content:
**Proxmox**

This dashboard provides an overview of your [Proxmox](https://www.proxmox.com/en/) cluster.
It focuses on the status and performance of nodes, VMs, containers, and more.
View the overall status of all your Proxmox nodes. Which are CPU loaded or memory loaded? Scope this dashboard using the `host` or `proxmox_name` parameter to get insight into individual Nodes.
View the overall health of your VMs- scope this dashboard using the `host` or `proxmox_name` parameter to get insight into individual VMs or scope by `proxmox_node` to see per-node data

View the overall health of your Containers- scope this dashboard using the `proxmox_name` parameter to get insight into individual containers or or scope by `proxmox_node` or `proxmox_pool` to see per-node or per-pool data
